title: The Classic Genius
description: A research app to help users collect scholar resaerch articles from all over the world, and give user an option to enhance their study with classical music. Moreover, if the user enjoy what they are hearing, there are links to lead user to a music library with more information on the artist and song playing.

title: Post To Sold
description: A website where users can post up old items for sale, like an online garage-sale! Users are able to create their own account, log in to post, view and sale stuff. This is an express, node, handlebars and mysql application.

title: The Travelers Compass
description: The Travelers Compass is a React application with connection to mongoose database that serve its purpose as place where a traveler or multiple travelers can join together to plan for their trip.

title: Eat-Da-Burger!
description: A burger logger application with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM. Users are able to order the burger that they like, click on a button and have that burger switch over to a different category. All information is stored inside MySQL databse.

title: Budget Tracker
description: A budget tracker application that can show user their spendings with a chart displaying funds added and subtracted overtime. Application has offline functionality that allow user to save their records in indexedDB and transfer the information over to app when it comes back online.

title: Eat-Da-Burger!
description: A burger logger application with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM. Users are able to order the burger that they like, click on a button and have that burger switch over to a different category. All information is stored inside MySQL databse.

title: Note Taker
description: An application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes. This application will use an express backend and save and retrieve note data from a JSON file.

title: Weather App
description: This application will give you weather forecast for any city in the world. Simply type in the name of the city in the search box to receive forecast for the current day and the week of. This application is especially useful when making travel plan.
